eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 12:07 AM ON OCT 29, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 03:14 AM NOV 02, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
A SAFE Alert has been issued for the Avondale Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Avondale PD is looking for 70 year old black male, Robert Jones last seen driving a 2015 Lexus RX350 bearing Arizona plate T A A 6 C L.

If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
